attributes.additional_details:
Many young people these days spend all their time online chatting, taking selfies and stupid videos or playing games.
They have no respect, no work ethic, no life skills and have foul attitudes. They have no desire to work, learn or to better themselves.
attributes.background: Bring back National Service for ages 16-30

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595268
